rules.name: Raiders and Reavers
rules.lore: Some Heretic Astartes warbands are piratical by nature, launching swift attacks focused on destroying their foes in a storm of bloody violence, seizing territory and spoils bnefore the enemy can bring reinforcements to bear.
rules.text: Ranged weapons equipped by +Heretic Astartes+ models in your army have +[Assault]+. All attacks made against enemy units within range of an objective marker have their Armor Break trait improved by 1.

spells.name: Warp Mark
spells.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, attacks made against that unit have +1 to their Wound roll.

spells.name: Prescience
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Heretic Astartes+ unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, it has +1 to all Hit rolls.

spells.name: Infernal Power
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Heretic Astartes+ +Vehicle+ unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, weapons equipped by the unit have +[Lethal Hits]+.

strategems.name: Dread Corsair
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, if the selected unit is wholly within 12" of your opponent's deployment zone, it may re-roll Hit rolls and Wound rolls.

strategems.name: Mark of the Hound
strategems.when: At the start of a Battle Round
strategems.effect: The selected unit may make a Normal move up to 6".

strategems.name: Tyrants Lash
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, you may re-roll Advance rolls, and your unit is eligible to Shoot after making a Fall Back move.
